prompt: Generate a modern and professional dashboard interface for a Flutter mobile app. The design should use a clean layout with a top app bar, bottom navigation menu, and a main content area. Include key dashboard elements such as a welcome message, user profile section, statistics cards (for sales, users, revenue, and tasks). Use a minimal, elegant color scheme with soft gradients, rounded corners, and good spacing. Ensure the UI is responsive, accessible, and visually appealing for professional use
